name: XCTrack
short_description: Becoming a defacto flight instrument for phones. Task setting, live airspace, competition task features, very customisable and a big community behind it.

name: XCMap
type: comp task planning, XC planning, comp/challenge platform
short_description: Home of the NCS - Northern Challenge Series

name: RASP - Stratus
short_description: Home of the official RASP UK

name: RASP - Synoptic
short_description: Friendly interface for RASP

name: Windy
short_description: Very good weather foreecasts

name: Airtribune
short_description: The main comp system

name: Lazy Rasp
short_description: Quick overview of RASP forecast, for the lazy

name: Open Railway Map
short_description: Great for finding trainstations when planning XC goal/retrives. Can also be set up as a screen in XCtrack when using pro

name: Pure Track
short_description: Aspiring to be the defacto location viewer - aggregates locatoin data from many sources into one view

name: Ribblehead Webcam
short_description: Live webcam view of Ribblehead and Whernside

name: Met Office Summit Forecasts (eg Dodd Fell)
short_description: The Met Office provide summit forecasts for many Dales flying sites

name: XCPara
short_description: XC planning over a RASP forecast

name: Trainline
short_description: Train ticket-buying/journey-planning app

name: Train Split
short_description: Much cheaper train tickets (ideal for self retrieve)

name: XC Guide
type: flight instrument, location sharing, location viewing, XC planning, comp task planning
short_description: The essential paragliding app for guiding, tracking and retrieves

name: Tracker
short_description: Recommended app for sharing location to livetrack24. Can also share to OGN and puretrack

name: Live Track 24
short_description: A location sharing/viewing system

name: XC Retrieve
short_description: This is the website to view locations. Specifically this ties into the Telegram retrieve groups system. Primarily uses livetrack24 but can also use inreach/spot satellite trackers

name: Sports Track LIve
short_description: A locatoin sharing system but killer feature is the ability to create 3D replays of tracklogs from IGC file upload

name: Wingit Paragliding Map
short_description: The Swiss Army knife for your next flying adventure. Sites, live conditions, forecasts, airspaces, glide range and more in one place. Wingit works well on spotty connections or even offline, letting you pivot on the go.

name: Paraglidable
short_description: Good weather forecast with simple clear is it flyable/xc - site finding features for the alps only

name: CANP
short_description: Alert RAF and GA pilots about mainly weekday flying. CANPs are added to the NOTAM database.

name: BHPA Membership Card Online
short_description: Never lose your membership card, FAI sport or IPPI card - all available online

name: XContest Live Tracking
short_description: real time locatoin tracking of xctrack users + anyone else pushing to xcontest

name: XC League
short_description: the original UK XC League

name: NOTAM Info
short_description: View all current NOTAMs for the UK. Steup alerts and customise view. Useful for XC and flying event planning.

name: Fly Like a Bird, Think Like a Pilot
short_description: Coaching, safety and development site dedicated to bring you skills safely up to speed.

name: Hilltop Analytics
type: weather, comms, location sharing, sites finder/info
short_description: A mixed bag of flight alerts via Telegram groups and tracking advice from Dales / PSC club member, Neil Charles.

name: Haggis Wildlife Foundation
short_description: Rare and endangered, keep an eye out for these critters whenever you land out.

name: Holfuy Weather Stations
short_description: Dotted around the UK, often on flying sites, are these live weather stations. There are three for the Dales; Wether (1390), Shack 'Int Dales (1339) & YDSC (1159).

name: Meteoblue
short_description: Well respected weather app. Best known for it's Multimodel Meteogram that shows the confidence of all the weather models in the forecasts for a week ahead. Good for flying abroad too.

name: Avia Weather
short_description: TAFF and METARs for a huge number of airports and strips. Great for live weather, especially if flying sites near Leeds Bradford Airport.

name: UKMO MSLP Analyses Charts
short_description: Surface Pressure Level charts for the North Atlantic. Isobars, Fronts, Pressure Systems, you get the picture.

name: The Flight Vario
short_description: If your phone has a half decent set of sensors this is a great backup vario in case your main fails. Has mapping too but not as accepted as XC Guide or XC Track.

name: Paragliding Forum
short_description: Lots of history, information. discussion. It's one way to get through the off season.

name: Bustimes
short_description: Use the live map to see what bus stops are nearby, what buses are running, when they are going to arrive and see where they are on the map.

name: Thermal map
short_description: Map fo thermal hot spots around the world

name: PSC Parlick Web cam
short_description: webcam image of Parlick

name: Web cam near Nont Sarah
short_description: Web cam and weather

name: Ogoy
short_description: Like sports track live but with better paid features. Comps can overlay tasks onto the map and less grunt needed to play on devices

name: 50km or Bust
short_description: Online book about getting started flying your first Cross County flights.

name: Glide and seek
short_description: Glide and Seek is a modern and mobile friendly glider and aircraft tracker fed from OGN

name: XCSoar
short_description: Open source flight computer

name: LK8000
short_description: Open source flight computer

name: Fly With Greg
short_description: Video theory, courses and community powered by Greg Hammerton

name: Mid Pennine Sites
short_description: A bunch of mid Pennine sites, either off piste, PSC/DHPC or DSC managed maintained by Nick C. Also, go to see a website vistitor counter... I'm getting '98 vibes all over again ;-)

name: Ribblehead Webcam 2
short_description: A high resolution view of Whernside -should be possible to see if wings in the air
